timeline.message:
GH-2175: Introduced new system property to configure SharedHttpClientSessionManager#executor corePoolSize

Signed-off-by: Erik Godding Boye <1142578+erikgb@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this use System.getProperty to get the value of the property?
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: It does, behind the scenes. Just have a look at the Integer#getInteger method! Using this approach avoids the boilerplate code required to cast a String to an Integer. But I see now that the corePoolSize variable should be int, and not the nullable Integer. I'll fix.
replies.author: erikgb
